column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Despite my delight in the paella and the dates - if I come back
column2: I'll be getting both again - Ba-Ba-Reeba didn't really change my mind regarding tapas places.  To fill yourself up
column3: you need to order several items.  The variety is nice
column5: but less friendly to the wallet.  I can definitely see the appeal of this place; some of the food was quite good.  However
column6: it's hard for me to look past the price for these small dishes
column7: which ultimately prevents me from giving a better review.
